56 . Star represents Byrd station from where data of meteorological parameters are available. ( b, c) δ 18O anomaly from the West and East Antarctica ice core records. ( d, e) Spatial correlation of ERA 40 Reanalysis surface air temperature with Niño 3.4 index and PDO index. The regions of significant correlation are highlighted in color band. This plot was generated using Climate Reanalyzer ( http://cci-reanalyzer.org), Climate Change Institute, University of Maine, USA.
